strings: <voice_0x0100092A><se_high>Valentina: Ah! You came!

<voice_0x0100092B><se_high>Valentina: I'm so sorry! I, I must have drifted off.
How rude of me!

<voice_0x0100092C><se_high>Valentina: I wanted to ask you a favour about this
crystal ball.

<voice_0x0100092D><se_high>Valentina: ...Sorry, I'm getting ahead of myself.
Perhaps I should start from the beginning?
<voice_0x0100092E><se_high>Valentina: Of course. Let me explain.
<voice_0x0100092F><se_high>Valentina: All right. I'll carry on then.
<voice_0x01000930><se_high>Valentina: My father, Kalderasha, was once a really famous fortune-teller.
<voice_0x01000931><se_high>Valentina: Lost treasure, missing people... There was nothing the Great Kalderasha couldn't help people with.

<voice_0x01000932><se_high>Valentina: But then one day he lost his powers.
All of a sudden, nothing he foretold turned out to be true any more.
<voice_0x01000933><se_high>Valentina: It's probably because he stopped using a real crystal ball. This glass ball isn't<endash>
<voice_0x01000934><se_low>Kalderasha: Valentina! What is going on here!?
<voice_0x01000935><se_low>Kalderasha: How many times have I told you not to touch my crystal ball?

<voice_0x01000936><se_low>Kalderasha: What? Aren't you that boy from the pub!?
What brings you here? ...Never mind!

<voice_0x01000937><se_low>Kalderasha: I do not know what my daughter has asked you, but you can forget it! I do not need your help!
I am fine as I am.
<voice_0x01000938><se_low>Kalderasha: I am going to bed. Valentina! Say your farewells and show our young visitor to the door.
<voice_0x01000939><se_high>Valentina: I'm sorry about my father.
<voice_0x0100093A><se_high>Valentina: But whatever he says, he's the one who's really suffering since he lost his powers.

<voice_0x0100093B><se_high>Valentina: That's why I wanted to ask you this favour.
Can you find him a crystal ball?
One that's big enough to bring back his powers?
<voice_0x0100093C><se_high>Valentina: Really? You will!? Oh, this is exactly how it all happened in my dream!
<voice_0x0100093D><se_high>Valentina: So far everything's come true!
<voice_0x0100093E><se_high>Valentina: I also dreamt that there's a crystal ball hidden deep inside the cave under the big waterfall to the south of town.
<voice_0x0100093F><se_high>Valentina: I suppose only the daughter of the Great Kalderasha could know a thing like that!

<voice_0x01000940><se_high>Valentina: Of course you won't. What was I thinking?
I'm just a stranger to you, after all.

<voice_0x01000941><se_high>Valentina: I'm so sorry. I suppose my dream was just that...
A dream, and nothing more.
<voice_0x01000942><se_low>King Trode: WHAT!? You imbecile! She told you all that and you still turned her down!?
<voice_0x01000943><se_low>King Trode: <Cap><hero>! Use your head, boy!

<voice_0x01000944><se_low>King Trode: If this Kalderasha gets his old powers back,
we can have him look into his crystal ball for us!
<voice_0x01000945><se_low>King Trode: He'll be able to tell us where that hateful Dhoulmagus is! What were you thinking of, turning her down like that!?

<voice_0x01000946><se_low>King Trode: Get back into town and tell her you'll help!
Go on, <hero>! Go!
<voice_0x01000947><se_low>King Trode: Hmmm, I see...

<voice_0x01000948><se_low>King Trode: Magnificent! Such devotion to her father!
I'm impressed! Just how a daughter should be!
<voice_0x01000949><se_low>King Trode: And if this Kalderasha gets his powers back, there's nothing he can't find, am I right?

<voice_0x0100094A><se_low>King Trode: Then we'll kill two birds with one stone!
If everything goes according to plan, we'll find out where that hateful Dhoulmagus is.
<voice_0x0100094B><se_low>King Trode: But time's getting on.
<voice_0x0100094C><se_low>King Trode: Medea and I will stay outside. That's the last time we set foot in a barbaric town like this.
<voice_0x0100094D><se_low>King Trode: But you should spend the night at the inn and rest well so that you're ready to take on the world tomorrow!
<voice_0x0100094E><se_low>King Trode: In the morning, we leave for the waterfall cave!
<voice_0x0100094F><se_def>*: Good morning! Did you have a good rest?
<voice_0x01000950><se_def>*: It was dark so I can't be sure, but I think the little old man you came with slept in his wagon outside the town gates last night.
<voice_0x01000951><se_def>*: Anyway, I hope you have a pleasant journey!
